two
three
four
five
six
'

p = subprocess.Popen(['grep', 'f'], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stdin=subprocess.PIPE)
p.stdin.write('one
two
three
four
five
six
')
p.communicate()[0]
p.stdin.close()
